instructions: Paste setup script into the Codex UI 'Setup Script' box.
Add each environment variable under 'Environment Variables'.
Ensure the container image is set to `universal` (Ubuntu 24.04).
Make sure the repo is cloned to: /workspace/vera-truth-system
Enable terminal if you want to monitor logs live.
Start backend automatically using nohup, logs routed to: /workspace/vera-truth-system/logs/api_startup.log
